name: Cooking Cake: Baby Candy Chef
description:
We all love delicious sweet cake. Plus, It's a lot of fun making one. How about a huge designer wedding cake with pink frosting? Or a sweet birthday cake with chocolate toppings? Even a DIY one with so many incredible yummy icings? Yes, here comes the most fabulous Cake Maker.

Product Features:
- A super fun food making game.
- Create all kinds of cake from scratch.
- Decorate each designer treat with pink frosting, chocolate and more.
- Pick from many different fun cake toppings.
